item.title: GPG - All I Need to Know
item.description: While I need to use GPG pretty regularly, I always have to look up the commands - they just don’t stick :-) Over the last couple of months I collected every command I had to use. Enjoy! encrypt a file gpg --encrypt --recipient someone@example.com filename decrypt a file gpg --decrypt -outfile filename filename.gpg show all local keys gpg --list-keys search and add a new key gpg --keyserver keys.openpgp.org --search-key someone@example.com import a public key from the file system gpg --import key.
